name: Faily Brakes Classic
description:
Legendary Phil Faily has survived life as a well-loved, smashing, crashing, yeeting rag doll for 5 years now… and to celebrate he is bringing you the limited edition, Faily Brakes Classic!!!

Go back to the beginning, early 2016, and enjoy a simpler time, No Ads, No Sales, No Offers!

Play in portrait, or landscape mode!– just play the game and unlock great costumes and cars and experience the downhill thrills and spills with Phil Faily and his Faily Brakes!
